name: Posidon's Quest
description:
As Posidon is the god of the seas, in Posidon's Quest you must drive the submarine Posidon through the deep sea collecting all the trash as possible in order to keep the sea a safe environment for all the marine lives. You should deviate from the small species, however, you may need to shoot the sharks and octopuses to not lose your life.

This game was inspired on that famous Atari game called Seaquest. It was developed using Unity engine.
